subject: Sir,
body:
Sir,
 
This is very urgent and your attention is needed.
 
In our office sometime last month, One Mr. John T. Kehoe of 1200 Fitch Way, Sacramento, CA. 95864 USA; filed an application contrary to your pending inheritance fund. The above mentioned person visited this bank last week with a Power of Attorney given in his favor by your good self, granting him the benefit to process and claim your inheritance of $15,000,000.00 for personal reasons.
 
He further stated that the online account details be terminated while the fund should be wired to his bank account with CHASE BANK, Account # 869210755, Routing # 021202337. We have asked Mr. John T. Kehoe to come back to the bank next week to enable us to have a personal confirmation from you, being hitherto the beneficiary. The Board of Directors discovered some foul play, and decided to move the fund to our affiliate bank in Germany.
 
* OUR OFFICES NEEDS TO KNOW:
1. Did you instruct one Mr. John T. Kehoe of 1200 Fitch way, Sacramento, CA. 95864, to claim and receive the payment on your behalf?
2. Did you sign any 'Deed of Assignment' in his favor thereby making him the current beneficiary?
 
We are sorry to have delayed your instruction in giving out this fund since we must adhere to the procedures of this honorable bank by making sure this request is verified and confirmed by the beneficiary and his existing attorney.
 
Your confirmation to the above will be appreciated.
 
Regards,
Phillip Moore
Contact E-mail: 
moorephillip425@gmail.com
DIRECTOR: International Operations-Debt Reconciliations/Payment
ISLE OF MAN BANK, ISLE OF MAN.

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
Hello Phillip Moore,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I must say, it's quite surprising to hear about Mr. John T. Kehoe claiming my pending fund. 

To answer your questions, no, I did not instruct Mr. Kehoe to claim or receive any payment on my behalf. Also, I have not signed any documents making him the current beneficiary.

Could you please provide more details about this situation? How did Mr. Kehoe come into possession of my personal information? And what steps are being taken by the bank to ensure the security of my funds?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Verna

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
Verna,

Thanks for your quick response to my email. And sorry for the delay, we
need to report the matter to the authorities in the United Kingdom and
Germany to arrest him. This letter was sent to you to confirm the below
name and the account information in my first mail. After the Bank of
England and Ministry of Finance (Germany) verified Mr. John T. Kehoe's
personal data last week, the Head of Senate Committee informed IMB-Debit
Reconciliation/Payment Dept. to contact the email he submitted for the
communication and final release of the fund in your favor, that's why you
receive this message in the first place.

The Board of Directors (ISLE OF MAN BANK) received orders to move the funds
to our affiliate bank in Germany for safe keeping after the false alarm
from Mr. John; Since you didn't authorize Mr. John T. Kehoe to receive this
inheritance fund in your name, I want you to send the following details
below for the due process of the inheritance fund worth $15,000,000.00
included with interest till date.

 FILL THE FORM BELOW FOR THE DOCUMENTATION OF THE INHERITANCE FUND.

* Your Name:
* Your Address:
* Age:
* Sex:
* Occupation:
* Mobile & Fax:

As soon as I receive the above information, the due process will start in
your name and I shall get back to you in the next 48 hours for the next
step to complete this transaction with our affiliate bank in Germany that
will be responsible for your final payment.

In other words, I want you to keep this transaction confidential and also
give me 100% full cooperation so that I can give you more directives.

This transaction is 100% free risk.

Regards,
Phillip Moore
Contact E-mail: moorephillip425@gmail.com
DIRECTOR: International Operations-Debt Reconciliations/Payment
ISLE OF MAN BANK, ISLE OF MAN.

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
Hello Phillip Moore,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's quite a situation with Mr. John T. Kehoe, isn't it? I'm glad that the Bank of England and Ministry of Finance Germany are involved to ensure everything is handled properly.

I'm curious about the process you mentioned. Could you explain more about how this works? And what role does the ISLE OF MAN BANK play in all this?

Also, I noticed that you asked for some personal details. While I understand that these might be necessary for your process, I hope you understand my hesitation in sharing such information over email due to privacy concerns.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Verna

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
Verna,



In response to your e-mail.



Mr. John T. Kehoe was arrested in Germany concerning this matter on a false
claim about the Inheritance fund. The German Ministry of Finance is
expecting your paperwork in order for them to approve the payment in your
name. We need to follow all the german modalities to claim this fund, the
remittance bank contact details will be sent to you via email to reach
them. In order to proceed you need to forward the details I requested from
you earlier, keep this transaction confidential.


The German bank will open a savings account with them in your name, where
you will have access to the account online, and be able to transfer the
funds in any of your account choices in the world.
Regards,

Phillip Moore

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
Hello Verna,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It's quite surprising to hear about Mr. John T. Kehoe's arrest in Germany. I hope everything is being sorted out properly.

I'm curious, how does the German Ministry of Finance handle such cases? And what kind of paperwork are they expecting from me? 

You mentioned that the remittance bank contact details will be sent via email. When can I expect to receive this email?

Also, could you please elaborate on the process of opening a savings account with the German bank? How would I be able to access it online and transfer funds?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Verna

subject: Re: Sir,
body:

subject: Re: Sir,
body:

Thanks for reaching out to me. I'm really excited about this opportunity! However, I have a few questions before we proceed.

Could you please explain more about the fund? What is it for and how will it be used? Also, could you provide some information about your organization?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Verna

subject: Re: Sir,
body:

Firstly, forward me the details to enable me to get more details.

subject: Re: Sir,
body:

subject: Re: Sir,
body:

subject: Re: Sir,
body:

subject: Re: Sir,
body:

to the bank to contact you for the remittance of the fund.
Without me file it with application of claim the bank can contact you

subject: Re: Sir,
body:

subject: Re: Sir,
body:

subject: Re: Sir,
body:

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
The Inheritance/Contract fund worth $15,000,000.00 he wanted to claim on
your behalf was attached to your email as the beneficiary so we quickly get
in touch with you for reconfirmation before we release the money to him.
You replied at the right time that you never authorize him to claim the
fund on your behalf. This is the information we need from you to claim this
fund:

* Your Name:
* Your Address:
* Age:
* Sex:
* Occupation:
* Mobile & Fax:

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite surprised to hear about this contract fund. I must admit, I don't recall authorizing anyone to claim any funds on my behalf.

Could you please provide more details about this situation? For instance, who is the person trying to claim the fund? How did they get my email address? And what exactly is this fund for?

I'm sorry but I can't provide the information you're asking for at this moment. However, I am interested in understanding more about this situation.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Verna

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
I don't know what to say again... Because you keep on repeating your
questions despite I told you will guide you to claim it all through the
process.

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
Hello there! I'm sorry if I seem to be repeating myself, it's just that I want to make sure I understand everything correctly. Could you please guide me through the process again? I promise to pay close attention this time.

Best wishes,
Verna
